languages.text: "Светом своей души ты рассекаешь тьму, готов{mf|ый|ая} подарить надежду тем, кто нуждается в ней. Прими свой свет".
"The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."
languages.original_text: "Светом своей души ты рассекаешь тьму, готов{mf|ый|ая} подарить надежду тем, кто нуждается в ней. Прими свой свет".

traits.locale_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."
"The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."
"The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."
"The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."
"The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

languages.text: “你灵魂的光芒足以刺破黑暗，为最绝望的人带来希望。接受你自己的光芒吧。”
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: “你灵魂的光芒足以刺破黑暗，为最绝望的人带来希望。接受你自己的光芒吧。”

languages.text: «La luz de tu alma disipa la oscuridad y lleva esperanza a quienes más la necesitan. Acepta esa luz».
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: «La luz de tu alma disipa la oscuridad y lleva esperanza a quienes más la necesitan. Acepta esa luz».

languages.text: « La clarté de votre âme perce l'obscurité, prête à donner de l'espoir à ceux qui en ont le plus besoin. Acceptez votre lumière. »
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: « La clarté de votre âme perce l'obscurité, prête à donner de l'espoir à ceux qui en ont le plus besoin. Acceptez votre lumière. »

languages.text: "Das Licht in Eurer Seele durchbohrt die Dunkelheit und kann denen Hoffnung geben, die sie am nötigsten haben. Akzeptiert Euer Licht."
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: "Das Licht in Eurer Seele durchbohrt die Dunkelheit und kann denen Hoffnung geben, die sie am nötigsten haben. Akzeptiert Euer Licht."

languages.text: 「お前の魂の光は暗闇を貫き、それを最も必要とする人々に希望を与えることが可能だ。お前は、その光を受け入れるべき存在だ」
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の魂の光は暗闇を貫き、それを最も必要とする人々に希望を与えることが可能だ。お前は、その光を受け入れるべき存在だ」

languages.text: "Ruhundaki ışık; karanlığı deliyor, ihtiyaç duyanlara umut veriyor. Işığını kabullen."
languages.original_text: "The light in your soul pierces the darkness, ready to give hope to those who need it most. Accept your light."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhundaki ışık karanlığı deliyor, ihtiyaç duyanlara umut veriyor. Işığını kabullen."
